name: n8n-owntracks-monorepo
description: Monorepo bridging OwnTracks & n8n - lightweight and easy to deploy

scripts.build: bun run --filter @n8n-owntracks/backend build && bun run --filter n8n-nodes-owntracks build
scripts.lint: bun run --filter @n8n-owntracks/backend lint && bun run --filter n8n-nodes-owntracks lint
scripts.clean: bun run --filter @n8n-owntracks/backend clean && bun run --filter n8n-nodes-owntracks clean && rm -rf node_modules bun_modules
